Thou art worthy, O Lord our God, *: to receive splendor and honor and kingly power,
For thou hast created everything that is, *
and by thy will they were created and have their being;
And thine by right, O Lamb that was slain, *
for with thy blood thou hast redeemed for God,
From every family, language, people, and nation, *
a kingdom of priests to serve our God.
And so, to him that sitteth upon the throne, *
Be worship and praise, dominion and splendor, *
for ever and for evermore. Amen.
